verbose_text: Upon binding of BV to CD30, the receptor - antibody complex undergoes clathrin mediated endocytosis and lysosomal fusion.20 Within the lysosome, MMAE is released by proteolytic cleavage and acts to inhibit the assembly and polymerization of microtubules, causing G2/M cell cycle arrest and subsequent apoptosis.18 Some MMAE may then diffuse into the tumor microenvironment to further act on neighboring cells.
